casebody.data:
620 A.2d 326 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. Gary Jay STEIN. Misc. (Subtitle BV) No. 50,

September Term, 1992.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. March 8, 1993.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the Consent to Disbarment from the practice of law filed by Gary Jay Stein, in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12 d 2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 8th day of March, 1993

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that Gary Jay Stein, be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of Gary Jay Stein, from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
